articles.author: Amala Balakrishner
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets set to track Wall Street gains on potential Fed rate cut - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. equity futures were little changed in early Asia hours, as investors await artificial intelligence darling Nvidia's earnings.
articles.content: Asia-Pacific rose Monday, tracking Wall Street gains after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell signaled that the central bank could begin easing monetary policy next month in his widely anticipated a… [+1131 chars]
